comments.text:
We *just* started using RemoveSlashMiddleware, AMO's using it too.

This could be moved to commonware or someplace similar.

SUMO:
https://github.com/jsocol/kitsune/blob/master/apps/sumo/middleware.py#L124
AMO:
https://github.com/jbalogh/zamboni/blob/master/apps/amo/middleware.py#L114
